summary: AN ORDINANCE authorizing the grant of two easements to Wallace A. Bowman and Ethel L. Bowman, his wife, for access road purposes across a portion of the City's Duwamish-White Center Heights transmission line right of way in the vicinity of South 96th Street and 8th Avenue South pursuant to Stipulations contained in condemnation Judgments acquiring said right-of-way. (King County Cause No. 55110, Verdict No. 8, Ordinance 88011.)
